```{r, echo = F}
library(knitr)
opts_chunk$set(tidy.opts = list(width.cutoff = 60), tidy = TRUE)
```

```{r}
set.seed(10)
```

```{r}
iris <- read.csv(file = 'Data_csv/Iris.csv')
iris$class <- factor(iris$class)
iris[, 1:4] <- scale(iris[, 1:4])
pcout <- princomp(~. - class, data = iris)
```
```{r}
plot(pcout$scores[, 1], pcout$scores[, 2], pch = 16, col = as.numeric(iris$class))
```

```{r}
library(kernlab)
```
```{r}
kpcout <- kpca(~. - class, data = iris, kernel = 'rbfdot', kpar = list(sigma = 1), features = 2)
plot(rotated(kpcout)[, 1], rotated(kpcout)[, 2], pch = 16, col = as.numeric(iris$class))
```

```{r}
kpcout <- kpca(~. - class, data = iris, kernel = 'rbfdot', kpar = list(sigma = 0.1), features = 2)
plot(rotated(kpcout)[, 1], rotated(kpcout)[, 2], pch = 16, col = as.numeric(iris$class))
```
